definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
variant of 協|协[xie2]/to cooperate/combined labor
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
CPPCC (Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference)/abbr. of 中國人民政治協商會議|中国人民政治协商会议[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 zhi4 Xie2 shang1 Hui4 yi4]
soccer association/soccer federation/abbr. for 足球協會|足球协会[zu2 qiu2 xie2 hui4]
soccer association/soccer federation/abbr. for 足球協會|足球协会[zu2 qiu2 xie2 hui4]
to assist/to help sb do sth/to cooperate in doing sth
Chinese Football Association Cup/soccer association cup

sentences.english: By using this method, we can realize the phase-covariant quantum cloning by four steps.
sentences.chinese: 用這種方法，相位協變量子克隆可以通過四步來實現。

sentences.english: China is a contracting party to the International Convention on the Harmonised Commodity Description and Coding System.
sentences.chinese: 我國是《商品名稱和編碼的協調製度公約》締約國。

sentences.english: For each good described in Box 7, identify the HS tariff classification to six digits.
sentences.chinese: 第七欄的每種貨物應填寫《協調製度》六位數編碼。

sentences.english: The result shows that there exists a class of optimal phase-covariant quantum cloning.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明存在一類最優相位協變量子克隆。

sentences.english: Collaboration diagrams can expand both vertically and horizontally to accommodate additional objects.
sentences.chinese: 協作圖可以垂直和水平地展開，從而適應附加的對象。

sentences.english: A co-inertia analysis showed that species abundance and environmental variables had significant relationship.
sentences.chinese: 協慣量分析結果表明，相對丰度與環境變量顯著相關。

sentences.english: This paper briefly introduces the mechanism of simple cokriging.
sentences.chinese: 本文對簡單協克里格法的基本原理做了簡要介紹。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of covariate imbalance on analysis of covariance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討協變量的不均衡對協方差分析的影響。

sentences.english: Hip isolations in belly dancing make great warm up exercises.
sentences.chinese: 在肚皮舞協隔離大力熱身運動。

definition: president of a club, committee etc
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
